titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of the Kingdom of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of the Kingdom of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations made.
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations tabled by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 21. Record Vote Number: 243.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of specified weapons and defense services to the government of Bahrain.
